p:
P. guineense stood out among the interviewees of the Dom Helder settlement in terms of ease of propagation and flavor. In fact, the species is simple to propagate through seeds, with no dormancy and having optimum temperatures for germination between 20 and 25 °C
52 . With regard to taste, araçá jelly is sometimes considered superior to common guava jelly
48 . However, it is necessary to carry out sensory evaluations with different fruit products between different audiences to attest its acceptance.
